projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.bodyText:
- Analyst Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Stroke Prediction And Analysis
projects.bodyText:
- Led the development of predictive analysis for early identification of stroke risk using data mining techniques and Knime software
 - Resulting in the implementation of logistic regression, decision tree, and neural network models with 95.303% accuracy

projects.title: Big Mart Sales Prediction
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Product Sale Prediction application utilizing XGBoost Machine Learning algorithm in Python.
 - Achieving a significant accuracy improvement of 10% over previous models like KNN, RandomForest, Linear Regression Algorithms.
 - Created a Power BI dashboard for a retail client to visualize sales data. The dashboard provided insights into sales trends, inventory levels, and customer preferences, resulting in a 15% increase in sales efficiency..

projects.title: Classification of Crop and Weed
projects.bodyText: - Worked on image classification using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) algorithm implemented with Python Technology.

projects.title: Data Analytics and Visualization Job Simulation, Accenture, Forage
projects.bodyText: - Successfully Completed Data Analytics and Visualization Job Simulation which was conducted by Accenture, Forage.

projects.title: End-to-End Database Design for a Brewing Company
projects.bodyText:
-   Led the complete life cycle of database development for a brewing company, starting from initial data modeling to the final database implementation.
 - Utilized SQL and MySQL to transform the conceptual database design into a fully functional and relational database system..

projects.title: Analysis of COVID-19 Vaccination Trends (2021) Using Tableau
projects.bodyText: -• Designed and developed a comprehensive Tableau Dashboard utilizing a COVID Vaccination 2021 dataset to present critical insights and trends.

projects.title: Strategic Business Modeling for an Intelligent Vending Machines Venture using UML
projects.bodyText:
-• Formulated a comprehensive business model for an innovative Intelligent Vending Machines concept, aligning high-level objectives with practical implementation strategies. 
 Translated conceptual business goals into tangible UML diagrams, including Use Case, Activity, Sequence, and Class diagrams, to visualize the end-to-end operational framework.

projects.title: Integrated Sales Analytics: Building Data Marts, Data Mining, and Visualizations
projects.bodyText: -Developed interactive visualizations within Power BI to showcase sales analytics dynamically, empowering stakeholders to engage with data and extract actionable insights

projects.title: Migrating to Cloud-Based Database Systems: A Comprehensive Guide
projects.bodyText:
-This Executive Brief talks about the challenges associated with on-premises database management systems and the benefits of migrating from in-house systems to cloud-based database systems. 
 The information outlined in this brief will help organizations select a cloud-based database services provider and the right location for implementing it.
